titleStmt.title: The Julian and Gregorian year, or, The difference betwixt the old and new-stile shewing, that the reformed churches should not alter their old-stile, but that the Romanists should return to it.
titleStmt.author: Willes, John, 1646 or 7-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Willis. cf. NUC pre-1956.
